definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
esterase, enzyme that breaks up esters by hydrolysis

pinyin: bing3 tong2 suan1 tuo1 qing1 mei2

sentences.english: Enzyme hydrolysis products from locust bean gum were oligosaccharides by HPLC analysis.
sentences.chinese: HPLC分析角豆膠酶水解液的主要產物是低聚糖。

sentences.english: The unrefined Veratryl alcohol extracted from fresh grape peel by organic solvent could significantly enhance Lip activity.
sentences.chinese: 有機萃取葡萄皮渣粗提藜蘆醇可提高酶活。

sentences.english: That is especially true for antiretroviral therapy.
sentences.chinese: 這些對於反轉錄酶療法的確相當正確。

sentences.english: Electrophosresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied for the presenting patterns and fractions of the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 應用不連續緩衝系統薄膜電泳法行酶譜分析。

sentences.english: The activity of intracellular enzyme was also lost during freeze-drying.
sentences.chinese: 同時，胞內的酶在凍幹過程中酶活也要降低。

sentences.english: Daqu spent grains and wheat bran were used as main raw materials to produce feed xylanase.
sentences.chinese: 以大麴丟糟和麥麩爲主要原料生產飼用木聚糖酶。

sentences.english: Aim To study optimial technology for autogenesis -enzyme hydrolysis of total flavonoid glycoside in scutellaria.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黃芩自生酶催化水解總黃酮苷的工藝條件。

sentences.english: The more LRP5, the more the enzyme is blocked, and the less serotonin is made.
sentences.chinese: LRP5越多，越多的酶被阻滯，複合胺產生越少。

sentences.english: There are no or faint enzyme reaction products in low differentiated adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 低分化腺癌上述酶大都無反應或反應微弱。

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型的口服抗艾滋病毒藥物屬於整合酶抑制劑。

sentences.english: Enolase isolated from peas was sensitive to fluoride .
sentences.chinese: 從豌豆提取的烯醇酶對氟化物敏感。

sentences.english: The growth speed of hypha was partly correlated with the change of enzyme activity.
sentences.chinese: 菌絲的生長速度與酶的活力變化有一定的相關性。

sentences.english: This invention describes a hydroxylamine benzene dismutase, its coding gene and applications.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種羥氨苯歧位酶及其編碼基因與應用。
帕拉米韋屬神經氨酸酶抑制劑。

sentences.english: Extraction technique in binary-water phase system has been widely used in separation and purification of enzyme.
sentences.chinese: 雙水相體系萃取技術巳被廣泛應用於酶的分離純化。

sentences.english: Pectinase treatment improved the CPAM drainage ability significantly without negative effect on the strength properties.
sentences.chinese: 酶處理對成紙的白度與強度性能沒有負面影響。

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
esterase, enzyme that breaks up esters by hydrolysis
